Title: For British Eyes Only
Plot: Investigating his father's claim that a British group set him up, Michael goes to "Wee Britain" and is smitten with a beautiful woman named Rita. Lindsay attempts to seduce the new family attorney, and Gob goes to extremes to avoid his newly discovered son.
GuestStars: Justin Grant Wade, BW Gonzalez, Charlize Theron, John Beard, Jonathan Schmock, Clinton Leupp, Rory Knox Johnston, Steve Stapenhorst, Harry Hamlin, Justin Grant Wade, Dave Thomas
